OUTLINE : Patients receive dacarbazine IV 2 hour , follow mitomycin IV 2-5 minute , doxorubicin IV 2-5 minute , cisplatin IV 2 hour day 1 . Patients also receive sargramostim ( GM-CSF ) subcutaneously ( SC ) every 12 hour day -6 -3 first chemotherapy course day 2-15 23-26 chemotherapy course .
